radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in echotexture without focal lesions. The gallbladder is minimally distended and contains non-mobile gallstones. There is gallbladder wall thickening measuring up to 4 mm, with gallbladder wall edema. Several foci of adenomyomatosis are noted within the gallbladder wall. The sonographic ___ sign is positive. The common bile duct is normal in caliber measuring 4 mm. The pancreatic duct is top normal, measuring 3 mm. There is no intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. Normal hepatopetal flow is seen within the main portal vein. Limited images of the right kidney demonstrate no hydronephrosis or stones.
